Name: Smokin' Paloma
Ingredients: 45 ml Del Maguey Vida Clásico Mezcal
30 ml Thomas Henry Pink Grapefruit soda
Instructions: SHAKE first 4 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with grapefruit soda.
Review: Mezcal adds its distinctive flavours to a classic Paloma .
History: Adapted from a recipe discovered in 2015 at Building on Bond in Brooklyn, New York City, USA.
Nutrition: One serving of Smokin' Paloma contains 158 calories
